name: Safety (TEA-DT Workshop)
description: A starter case (incomplete argument pattern) for the TEA-DT workshops.

goals.name: G1
goals.short_description: The digital twin is safe for use in its intended operational environment.

context.name: C1
context.short_description: Add intended use case of DT module or system.
context.long_description: Add intended use case of DT module or system.

property_claims.name: P1
property_claims.short_description: All potential hazards associated with the system have been identified.
property_claims.long_description: All potential hazards associated with the system have been identified.

property_claims.name: P4
property_claims.short_description: Risks associated with identified hazards are assessed and mitigated to acceptable levels.
property_claims.long_description: Risks associated with identified hazards are assessed and mitigated to acceptable levels.

property_claims.name: P7
property_claims.short_description: Failure modes for all critical components and functions have been identified.
property_claims.long_description: Failure modes for all critical components and functions have been identified.

property_claims.name: P8
property_claims.short_description: Appropriate corrective actions for identified failure modes are implemented and effective.
property_claims.long_description: Appropriate corrective actions for identified failure modes are implemented and effective.

property_claims.name: P11
property_claims.short_description: Compliance with safety requirements is verified through testing and analysis.
property_claims.long_description: Compliance with safety requirements is verified through testing and analysis.

property_claims.name: P12
property_claims.short_description: Safety controls and measures to mitigate identified risks are implemented.
property_claims.long_description: Safety controls and measures to mitigate identified risks are implemented.

property_claims.name: P2
property_claims.short_description: The system components are safe.
property_claims.long_description: The system components are safe.

property_claims.name: P2.6
property_claims.short_description: All potential hazards associated with the system have been identified.
property_claims.long_description: All potential hazards associated with the system have been identified.

property_claims.name: P2.1
property_claims.short_description: Risks associated with identified hazards are assessed and mitigated to acceptable levels.
property_claims.long_description: Risks associated with identified hazards are assessed and mitigated to acceptable levels.

property_claims.name: P2.5
property_claims.short_description: Failure modes for all critical components and functions have been identified.
property_claims.long_description: Failure modes for all critical components and functions have been identified.

property_claims.name: P2.4
property_claims.short_description: Appropriate corrective actions for identified failure modes are implemented and effective.
property_claims.long_description: Appropriate corrective actions for identified failure modes are implemented and effective.

property_claims.name: P2.3
property_claims.short_description: Compliance with safety requirements is verified through testing and analysis.
property_claims.long_description: Compliance with safety requirements is verified through testing and analysis.

property_claims.name: P2.2
property_claims.short_description: Safety controls and measures to mitigate identified risks are implemented.
property_claims.long_description: Safety controls and measures to mitigate identified risks are implemented.

property_claims.name: P5
property_claims.short_description: The system components are secure.
property_claims.long_description: The system components are secure.

property_claims.name: P5.3
property_claims.short_description: {Component N} maintains confidentiality of sensitive information.
property_claims.long_description: {Component N} maintains confidentiality of sensitive information.

property_claims.name: P5.2
property_claims.short_description: {Component N} maintains integrity and accuracy of operational data.
property_claims.long_description: {Component N} maintains integrity and accuracy of operational data.

property_claims.name: P5.1
property_claims.short_description: {Component N} monitors actions to enable transparency and accountability.
property_claims.long_description: {Component N} monitors actions to enable transparency and accountability.

property_claims.name: P3
property_claims.short_description: The impacts of the system are fair for all users within the intended operational environment.
property_claims.long_description: The impacts of the system are fair for all users within the intended operational environment.

property_claims.name: P3.2
property_claims.short_description: Positive impacts of the system's use and deployment do not unfairly accrue to specific sub-group of users.
property_claims.long_description: Positive impacts of the system's use and deployment do not unfairly accrue to specific sub-group of users.

property_claims.name: P3.1
property_claims.short_description: Negative impacts of the system's use and deployment do not disproportionately affect specific sub-groups of users.
property_claims.long_description: Negative impacts of the system's use and deployment do not disproportionately affect specific sub-groups of users.

property_claims.name: P13
property_claims.short_description: All relevant sub-groups of users have been meaningfully consulted across the lifecycle of the system.
property_claims.long_description: All relevant sub-groups of users have been meaningfully consulted across the lifecycle of the system.

property_claims.name: P13.3
property_claims.short_description: Users were consulted during the system design phase.
property_claims.long_description: Users were consulted during the system design phase.

property_claims.name: P13.2
property_claims.short_description: Users were consulted during the system development phase.
property_claims.long_description: Users were consulted during the system development phase.

property_claims.name: P13.1
property_claims.short_description: Users were consulted during the system deployment phase.
property_claims.long_description: Users were consulted during the system deployment phase.

property_claims.name: P10
property_claims.short_description: All relevant biases have been identified and mitigated across the project lifecycle.
property_claims.long_description: All relevant biases have been identified and mitigated across the project lifecycle.

property_claims.name: P10.3
property_claims.short_description: Cognitive biases have been assessed and addressed.
property_claims.long_description: Cognitive biases have been assessed and addressed.

property_claims.name: P10.2
property_claims.short_description: Statistical and data biases have been assessed and addressed.
property_claims.long_description: Statistical and data biases have been assessed and addressed.

property_claims.name: P10.1
property_claims.short_description: Social biases have been assessed and addressed.
property_claims.long_description: Social biases have been assessed and addressed.

property_claims.name: P9
property_claims.short_description: A system for continuous monitoring of safety performance is established.
property_claims.long_description: A system for continuous monitoring of safety performance is established.

property_claims.name: P9.2
property_claims.short_description: Appropriate thresholds have been set to identify undesirable model drift.
property_claims.long_description: Appropriate thresholds have been set to identify undesirable model drift.

property_claims.name: P9.1
property_claims.short_description: Automated alerts are triggered when thresholds for model drift are exceeded.
property_claims.long_description: Automated alerts are triggered when thresholds for model drift are exceeded.

property_claims.name: P6
property_claims.short_description: Procedures for updating the safety case and system design in response to monitoring feedback are in place.
property_claims.long_description: Procedures for updating the safety case and system design in response to monitoring feedback are in place.
